name: duplicate Minecraft 4K
summary:
Edit inventory and world settings (including dev only settings) right from the app!

Yet another world first - Plug Toolbox lets you do so much, get all the Minecraft stuff you need and edit so many settings it will blow your mind!

- Set your achievement level to any level you like, cheat your way to the top!
- Set your game mode to any mode you like (including Survival mode, Creative mode, Spectator mode or Adventure mode)
- Set other players gamemode different to yours - even without activating cheats
- Set your world spawn point to anything
- Change any setting without enabling Minecraft cheats
- Make the world immutable (can't be destroyed)
- Make yourself invulnerable - our favourite Minecraft hack - be the best Minecraft Hacker :)
- Set 'Keep Inventory' for just yourself or for every player (not just globally like in the game) so only you and/or other players don't lose inventory when they die
- Turn PvP on or off
- Show coordinates without cheats on
- Enable the Minecraft map (map item update) from start
- Remove Addon, Texture Pack, Resource Pack, Add-on locks from worlds
- Change your walk speed
- Change and set a CUSTOM default permission level for new players (not possible in the game normally) and op / ops - great for hosting your world online with Minecraft multiplayer or a Minecraft server
- Set a forced spawnpoint (even with no bed)
- Change your player attributes like Absorbtion, Health, Experience
- Set any item in any Armor slot
- Put swords and anything you like in Offhand (yes - now you can have swords in both hands!)
- Add ANY item to your Minecraft inventory, even custom ids. Need a bow, sword, armor, wood, some blocks, diamond, TNT, or spawn eggs for a Creeper, Zombie, Ender dragon or any other mob or creature?
- Control who can fly and the fly speed
- Add any Minecraft items to Ender Chests
- Import and edit Minecraft worlds from the internet from any site ( eg. mcpedl ) or other Minecraft map apps for free
- Enchant anything and everything with every enchantment all the way up to level 32767!
- Get any Minecraft potion or as many Minecraft potions as you want or need!
- Set any level seed even the elusive 0 (which isn't normally possible)
- No need to craft or mine just add the item to your inventory!
- Export the world directly to MCPE (Mc PE / Minecraft PE / Minecraft Bedrock Edition) right from the app.
- All this and more even with out having to activate cheats

Plug Toolbox has all the best cheats for Minecraft you'll ever need, with a settings level editor / map editor / world editor - Why play vanilla Minecraft when you can customise it the way you want - Plug Toolbox is the best way to mod your world settings, player settings and inventory :)

These are just some of the many many things you can do with Plug Toolbox with much much more to come - get your copy now at this special price.

There are so many possibilities, we're excited to see what you come up with by playing with all these settings. For example we noticed you can put a block in the helmet Armor slot (LOL!)

Don't forget to send us a tweet @indevelopers with your screenshots, videos, screen records or just a note with what you have discovered!

Plug Toolbox for Minecraft 2 - brand new for 2018
